mapper.sql: COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, PRICE, UNITS, COUNTS, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, MAXAPPLYNUM, STATUS, BREEDID, TRADEDAYS, CODEDELIVERY, NONISSUEREG, PUBMEMBERID, MINAPPLYNUM, MINAPPLYQUAMOVE, PUBLISHALGR, DEALERPUBCHARATIO, MKTDEAPUBCHARATIO, PUBLISHERCHARATIO, MKTPUBCHARATIO, CURRSTATUS, SUPERVISEDPRICE, LISTINGDATE, LASTTRADATE, CONTRACTFACTOR, MINPRICEMOVE, MINQUANTITYMOVE, SPREADALGR, SPREADUPLMT, SPREADDOWNLMT, CONTRACTFACTORNAME,MAPPERID
mapper.select: select from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF t where t.BREEDID = #{breedid}) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}
select from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF t) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}
select count(*) from IPO_COMMODITY_CONF where BREEDID = #{breedid}
mapper.insert: insert into IPO_COMMODITY_CONF ( COMMODITYID, COMMODITYNAME, PRICE, UNITS, COUNTS, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, MAXAPPLYNUM, STATUS, BREEDID, TRADEDAYS, CODEDELIVERY, NONISSUEREG, PUBMEMBERID, MINAPPLYNUM, MINAPPLYQUAMOVE, PUBLISHALGR, DEALERPUBCHARATIO, MKTDEAPUBCHARATIO, PUBLISHERCHARATIO, MKTPUBCHARATIO, CURRSTATUS, SUPERVISEDPRICE, LISTINGDATE, LASTTRADATE, CONTRACTFACTOR, MINPRICEMOVE, MINQUANTITYMOVE, SPREADALGR, SPREADUPLMT, SPREADDOWNLMT, CONTRACTFACTORNAME, MAPPERID) values ( #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{units,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{counts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maxapplynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{breedid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tradedays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{codedelivery,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nonissuereg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pubmemberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minapplynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minapplyquamove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{publishalgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealerpubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktdeapubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{publishercharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mktpubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{currstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supervisedprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{listingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{lasttradate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{contractfactor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minpricemove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minquantitymove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spreadalgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spreaduplmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spreaddownlmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{contractfactorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapperid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update IPO_COMMODITY_CONF set COMMODITYNAME = #{commodityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNITS = #{units,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COUNTS = #{counts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=DATE}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, MAXAPPLYNUM = #{maxapplynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BREEDID = #{breedid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRADEDAYS = #{tradedays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CODEDELIVERY = #{codedelivery,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NONISSUEREG = #{nonissuereg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUBMEMBERID = #{pubmemberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MINAPPLYNUM = #{minapplynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINAPPLYQUAMOVE = #{minapplyquamove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUBLISHALGR = #{publishalgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEALERPUBCHARATIO = #{dealerpubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MKTDEAPUBCHARATIO = #{mktdeapubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUBLISHERCHARATIO = #{publishercharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MKTPUBCHARATIO = #{mktpubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRSTATUS = #{currstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPERVISEDPRICE = #{supervisedprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LISTINGDATE = #{listingdate,jdbcType=DATE}, LASTTRADATE = #{lasttradate,jdbcType=DATE}, CONTRACTFACTOR = #{contractfactor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINPRICEMOVE = #{minpricemove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINQUANTITYMOVE = #{minquantitymove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPREADALGR = #{spreadalgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPREADUPLMT = #{spreaduplmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPREADDOWNLMT = #{spreaddownlmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACTFACTORNAME = #{contractfactorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAPPERID = #{mapperid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
